sentence.text: The double-strand break repair via homologous recombination recombinase plays a central role in homologous recombination (HR), which is critical for repair of DNA double-strand breaks, maintenance of genomic stability, and prevention of developmental disorders and cancer.

entity.text: double-strand break repair via homologous recombination

sentence.text: Interestingly, regulation of double-strand break repair via homologous recombination is recruited to sites of DNA damage in a manner that is independent of breast cancer 2, early onset, double-strand break repair via homologous recombination, and probably, RAD51 paralogs.

entity.text: regulation of double-strand break repair via homologous recombination
double-strand break repair via homologous recombination

sentence.text: Collectively, our study uncovers a protein complex, which consists of regulation of double-strand break repair via homologous recombination and cellular response to DNA damage stimulus/SPIDR, in DNA repair and provides potential directions for cancer diagnosis and therapy.

entity.text: regulation of double-strand break repair via homologous recombination
